ApproxsimClient.timeline
Class Timeline

java.lang.Object
  ApproxsimClient.timeline.Timeline
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener, ApproxsimEventListener, ActivityAdapterListener
public class Timeline
extends Object
implements ApproxsimEventListener, ActivityAdapterListener

Timeline is primarily used to select the times for the simulation data to be delivered and visualized on the client. Besides the timeline is used for visualization and modification of the activities.

public void setUpTimeline(long endTime)
Used to set up the timeline with all the time steps from the simulation start time to the given time.

Parameters:
endTime - actual time in milliseconds - ends the selected time interval.

Updates the size of the time step.

Parameters:
dt - the new time step.
refTime - the reference time ie. the time when the new time step starts to be in effect.
